description: This category includes Vitamin A and its derivatives, which are primarily used for their vitamin properties. Vitamin A is essential for vision, immune function, and skin health.

description: This category includes Vitamin B1 (Thiamine) and its derivatives, primarily used for their vitamin properties. Thiamine is crucial for energy metabolism and nerve function.
original_description: Vitamin B1 and its derivatives, used primarily as vitamins

description: This category includes Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin) and its derivatives, primarily used for their vitamin properties. Riboflavin is important for energy production and cellular growth.

description: This category includes D-Pantothenic acid or DL-pantothenic acid (also known as Vitamin B3 or B5) and their derivatives, primarily used for their vitamin properties. Pantothenic acid is vital for synthesizing coenzyme A, essential for fatty acid metabolism.

description: This category includes Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine) and its derivatives, primarily used for their vitamin properties. Pyridoxine is involved in amino acid metabolism and neurotransmitter synthesis.

description: This category includes Vitamin B12 (Cobalamin) and its derivatives, primarily used for their vitamin properties. Cobalamin is essential for nerve tissue health, brain function, and red blood cell production.

description: This category includes Vitamin C (Ascorbic acid) and its derivatives, primarily used for their vitamin properties. Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant and is crucial for immune function and collagen synthesis.

description: This category includes Vitamin E and its derivatives, primarily used for their vitamin properties. Vitamin E is a fat-soluble antioxidant that protects cells from damage.
original_description: Vitamin E and its derivatives, used primarily as vitamins

description: This entry covers Somatropin (human growth hormone), its derivatives, and structural analogues, which are primarily used as hormones. Somatropin is used to treat growth hormone deficiency.
original_description: Somatropin, its derivatives and structural analogues, used primarily as hormones

description: This entry covers Insulin and its salts, which are primarily used as hormones. Insulin is a vital hormone for regulating blood sugar levels and is used in the treatment of diabetes.
original_description: Insulin and its salts, used primarily as hormones

description: This category includes polypeptide hormones, protein hormones, and glycoprotein hormones, their derivatives, and structural analogues, primarily used as hormones, excluding Somatropin and Insulin. This covers a wide range of other protein-based hormones.

description: This entry covers specific corticosteroidal hormones: Cortisone, Hydrocortisone, Prednisone (dehydrocortisone), and Prednisolone (dehydrohydrocortisone). These are powerful anti-inflammatory and immunosuppressive drugs.
original_description: Cortisone, hydrocortisone, prednisone "dehydrocortisone" and prednisolone "dehydrohydrocortisone"

description: This entry covers Oestrogens (Estrogens) and Progestogens (Progestins). These are female sex hormones used in hormone replacement therapy, contraception, and to treat various gynecological conditions.

description: This category includes other steroidal hormones, their derivatives, and structural analogues, primarily used as hormones, excluding specific corticosteroids (Cortisone, Hydrocortisone, Prednisone, Prednisolone), halogenated derivatives, oestrogens, and progestogens. This covers a range of other steroid-based hormones.

description: This entry covers Prostaglandins, Thromboxanes, and Leukotrienes, their derivatives, and structural analogues, primarily used as hormones. These are lipid compounds with hormone-like effects, involved in inflammation, blood clotting, and other physiological processes.

description: This is a broad residual category for natural or synthetic hormones, their derivatives, and structural analogues, primarily used as hormones, excluding various specific types already listed (polypeptide, protein, glycoprotein, steroidal, catecholamine hormones, prostaglandins, thromboxanes, leukotrienes, and amino-acid derivatives).

description: This entry covers Rutoside (also known as Rutin) and its derivatives. Rutin is a bioflavonoid found in certain plants, often used as a dietary supplement for its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.

description: This broad category includes natural or synthetic glycosides and their salts, ethers, esters, and other derivatives, excluding Rutoside (Rutin) and its derivatives. original_description: Glycosides, natural or reproduced by synthesis, and their salts, ethers, esters and other derivatives (excl. rutoside "rutin" and its derivatives)

original_description: Digitalis glycosides

description: This entry specifically covers Glycyrrhizic acid and glycyrrhizates. Glycyrrhizic acid is a triterpenoid saponin found in licorice root, known for its sweet taste and traditional medicinal uses.

description: This is a residual category for natural or synthetic glycosides and their salts, ethers, esters, and other derivatives, excluding Rutoside (Rutin), Digitalis glycosides, Glycyrrhizic acid, and glycyrrhizates. It covers other unclassified glycoside compounds.

description: This category includes concentrates of poppy straw and a list of specific opioid alkaloids derived from opium, such as Buprenorphine, Codeine, Dihydrocodeine, Ethylmorphine, Etorphine, Heroin, Hydrocodone, Hydromorphone, Morphine, Oxycodone, Oxymorphone, Pholcodine, Thebacon, and Thebaine, and their salts. description: This entry covers Caffeine and its salts. Caffeine is a central nervous system stimulant found in coffee, tea, and many soft drinks, widely used to combat fatigue and improve alertness.
original_description: Caffeine and its salts

description: This entry specifically covers Ephedrine and its salts. Ephedrine is a sympathomimetic amine used as a stimulant, appetite suppressant, decongestant, and to treat hypotension.

description: This entry specifically covers Norephedrine and its salts. Norephedrine is a sympathomimetic amine used as a decongestant and sometimes as a stimulant.

description: This entry covers Levometamfetamine, Metamfetamine (methamphetamine), Metamfetamine racemate, and their salts. These are potent central nervous system stimulants with high potential for abuse.

description: This entry covers Cocaine, Ecgonine, and their salts, esters, and other derivatives. Cocaine is a powerful stimulant and highly addictive recreational drug, while Ecgonine is a tropane alkaloid and a precursor to cocaine.
original_description: Cocaine, ecgonine; salts, esters and other derivatives thereof

description: This is a broad residual category for natural or synthetic vegetal alkaloids and their salts, ethers, esters, and other derivatives, excluding a wide range of specific alkaloids already listed, such as opium alkaloids, cinchona alkaloids, theophylline, aminophylline, ergot alkaloids, cocaine, ecgonine, ephedrines, and caffeine.

description: This entry specifically covers Nicotine and its salts, ethers, esters, and other derivatives. Nicotine is a stimulant alkaloid found in tobacco, known for its addictive properties.
original_description: Nicotine and its salts, ethers, esters and other derivatives thereof

description: This is a very broad residual category for natural or synthetic vegetal alkaloids and their salts, ethers, esters, and other derivatives, excluding a vast array of specific alkaloids already listed, including opium alkaloids, cinchona alkaloids, theophylline, aminophylline, ergot alkaloids, cocaine, ecgonine, ephedrines, caffeine, and nicotine.

description: This entry covers chemically pure sugars (excluding sucrose, lactose, maltose, glucose, and fructose), as well as sugar ethers, sugar acetals, and sugar esters, and their salts. It excludes natural or synthetic provitamins, vitamins, hormones, glycosides, and vegetal alkaloids.

description: This category includes Penicillins and their derivatives that possess a penicillanic acid structure, along with their salts. Penicillins are a class of beta-lactam antibiotics widely used to treat bacterial infections.
original_description: Penicillins and their derivatives with a penicillanic acid structure; salts thereof

description: This entry covers Streptomycins and their derivatives, along with their salts. Streptomycins are a class of aminoglycoside antibiotics primarily used to treat tuberculosis and other severe bacterial infections.
original_description: Streptomycins and their derivatives; salts thereof

description: This entry specifically covers Dihydrostreptomycin, its salts, esters, and hydrates. Dihydrostreptomycin is an aminoglycoside antibiotic, closely related to streptomycin, used to treat bacterial infections.
original_description: Dihydrostreptomycin, its salts, esters and hydrates

description: This is a residual category for Streptomycins and their derivatives and salts, excluding Dihydrostreptomycin and its salts, esters, and hydrates. It covers other unclassified streptomycin-related compounds.

description: This entry covers Tetracyclines and their derivatives, along with their salts. Tetracyclines are a class of broad-spectrum antibiotics used to treat a wide range of bacterial infections.
original_description: Tetracyclines and their derivatives; salts thereof

description: This entry covers Chloramphenicol and its derivatives, along with their salts. Chloramphenicol is a broad-spectrum antibiotic used for serious bacterial infections, though its use is limited due to potential side effects.
original_description: Chloramphenicol and its derivatives; salts thereof

description: This entry covers Erythromycin and its derivatives, along with their salts. Erythromycin is a macrolide antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections, especially in patients allergic to penicillin.
original_description: Erythromycin and its derivatives; salts thereof

description: This is a broad residual category for antibiotics, excluding specific classes like penicillins, streptomycins, tetracyclines, chloramphenicol, and erythromycin, and their derivatives and salts. This covers other unclassified antibiotic compounds.

description: This is a catch-all category for separate chemically defined organic compounds that are not elsewhere specified or included in other categories. This covers a vast array of organic chemicals with diverse structures and applications.

description: This entry specifically covers Heparin and its salts. Heparin is a widely used anticoagulant (blood thinner) medication, used to prevent and treat blood clots.

description: This category includes Antisera and other blood fractions. Antisera are blood serum containing antibodies, used to provide passive immunity. Blood fractions are components of blood separated for therapeutic use, such as albumin or immunoglobulins.
original_description: Antisera and other blood fractions

description: This entry covers unmixed immunological products, not put up in measured doses or in forms or packings for retail sale, excluding diagnostic reagents. These are bulk immunological substances, such as antibodies or antigens, used in further manufacturing or research.

description: This entry covers mixed immunological products, not put up in measured doses or in forms or packings for retail sale, excluding diagnostic reagents. These are bulk mixtures of immunological substances, such as combined antibodies or antigens, used in further manufacturing or research.
original_description: Immunological products, mixed, not put up in measured doses or in forms or packings for retail sale (excl. diagnostic reagents)

description: This entry covers immunological products put up in measured doses or in forms or packings for retail sale, excluding diagnostic reagents. These are finished immunological products, such as vaccines or antibody therapies, ready for direct medical use.
original_description: Immunological products, put up in measured doses or in forms or packings for retail sale (excl. diagnostic reagents)

description: This category includes Vaccines for human medicine. Vaccines are biological preparations that provide active acquired immunity to a particular infectious disease.

description: This category includes Vaccines for veterinary medicine. These are biological preparations used to provide active acquired immunity to animals against various infectious diseases.

original_description: Electric conductors for a voltage > 80 V but < 1.000 V, insulated, not fitted with connectors, n.e.s. (excl. winding wire, coaxial conductors, wiring sets for vehicles, aircraft or ships, and wire and cables with individual conductor wires of a diameter > 0,51 mm)

description: This covers insulated electrical conductors for voltages up to 1,000 volts, without connectors, excluding winding wire, coaxial conductors, wiring sets, and wires with individual conductors larger than 0.51 mm.
original_description: Electric conductors for a voltage 1.000 V, insulated, not fitted with connectors, n.e.s. (excl. winding wire, coaxial conductors, wiring sets for vehicles, aircraft or ships, and wire and cables with individual conductor wires of a diameter > 0,51 mm)

description: These are insulated electrical conductors designed for voltages exceeding 1,000 volts.

description: These are insulated electrical conductors, not made with copper conductors, designed for voltages exceeding 1,000 volts.
original_description: Electric conductors for a voltage > 1.000 V, insulated, not with copper conductors, n.e.s.

original_description: Optical fibre cables made up of individually sheathed fibres, whether or not containing electric conductors or fitted with connectors

description: These are electrodes made of graphite or other carbon materials, specifically designed for use in electric furnaces, typically for melting metals or other high-temperature processes.

description: These are brushes made of carbon, used in electrical motors and generators to conduct current between stationary and rotating parts.

description: This category includes various articles made of graphite or other carbon materials, used for electrical purposes, but excluding electrodes and carbon brushes.
original_description: Articles of graphite or other carbon, for electrical purposes (excl. electrodes and carbon brushes)

description: These are heating elements made of graphite or other carbon materials, used in electrical applications where heat generation is required.
original_description: Heating resistors for electrical purposes, of graphite or other carbon

description: This covers articles made of graphite or other carbon materials for electrical purposes, excluding electrodes, carbon brushes, and heating resistors.
original_description: Articles of graphite or other carbon, for electrical purposes (excl. electrodes, carbon brushes and heating resistors)

description: These are electrical insulators made of glass, used to prevent the flow of electricity in electrical systems, but excluding insulating fittings.

description: These are electrical insulators made of ceramic materials, used to prevent the flow of electricity in electrical systems, but excluding insulating fittings.

description: These are electrical insulators made of plastics, used to prevent the flow of electricity in electrical systems, but excluding insulating fittings.

description: This covers electrical insulators made from materials other than glass, ceramics, or plastics, and excludes insulating fittings.
original_description: Electrical insulators (excl. those of glass, ceramics or plastics and insulating fittings)

description: These are ceramic components specifically designed to provide electrical insulation and support in electrical systems.
original_description: Insulating fittings for electrical purposes, of ceramics

description: These are plastic components specifically designed to provide electrical insulation and support in electrical systems.

description: This is a general category for electrical parts of machinery or apparatus that are not classified elsewhere in Chapter 85.
original_description: Electrical parts of machinery or apparatus, n.e.s. in chapter 85

description: These are memory devices configured in multi-combination forms, such as stacked DRAMs and memory modules, used in computers and other electronic systems.
original_description: Memories in multicombinational forms such as stack D-RAMs and modules

description: These are LED-based lighting units used as backlights for LCD screens. They consist of one or more LEDs, connectors, and are mounted on a circuit board, potentially with optical components or protective diodes.
original_description: LED backlight modules, which are lighting sources that consist of one or more LEDs, and one or more connectors and are mounted on a printed circuit or other similar substrate, and other passive components, whether or not combined with optical components or protective diodes, and used as backlight illumination for LCDs, n.e.s.

description: This is a general category for electrical parts of machinery or apparatus that are not classified elsewhere in Chapter 85.
original_description: Electrical parts of machinery or apparatus, n.e.s. in chapter 85

original_description: Spent primary cells and primary batteries, containing lead, cadmium or mercury

original_description: Waste and scrap of primary cells, primary batteries and electric accumulators (excl. of lead-acid), containing lead, cadmium or mercury

original_description: Primary cells, primary batteries and electric accumulators: spent goods and waste and scrap, sorted by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

original_description: Spent primary cells and primary batteries, sorted by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

original_description: Spent electric accumulators, sorted by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

synonyms: Waste and scrap of batteries (sorted, no heavy metals)
original_description: Waste and scrap of primary cells, primary batteries and electric accumulators, sorted by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

original_description: Primary cells, primary batteries and electric accumulators: spent goods and waste and scrap, unsorted, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

original_description: Spent primary cells and primary batteries, unsorted, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

description: These are rechargeable batteries that have been used up, are unsorted, and do not contain lead, cadmium, or mercury.

original_description: Spent electric accumulators, unsorted, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

description: This refers to the waste and scrap materials from primary cells, primary batteries, and electric accumulators that are unsorted and do not contain lead, cadmium, or mercury.

original_description: Waste and scrap of primary cells, primary batteries and electric accumulators, unsorted, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

original_description: Primary cells, primary batteries and electric accumulators: spent goods and waste and scrap, sorted but not by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

description: These are non-rechargeable batteries that have been used up, are sorted but not by chemical type, and do not contain lead, cadmium, or mercury.

original_description: Spent primary cells and primary batteries, sorted but not by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

description: These are rechargeable batteries that have been used up, are sorted but not by chemical type, and do not contain lead, cadmium, or mercury.

original_description: Spent electric accumulators, sorted but not by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

description: This refers to the waste and scrap materials from primary cells, primary batteries, and electric accumulators that are sorted but not by chemical type, and do not contain lead, cadmium, or mercury.

original_description: Waste and scrap of primary cells, primary batteries and electric accumulators, sorted but not by chemical type, not containing lead, cadmium or mercury

description: This covers electrical and electronic waste and scrap primarily intended for recovering precious metals. It specifically includes waste containing primary cells, batteries, mercury-switches, certain types of glass, or electrical/electronic components with cadmium, mercury, lead, or PCBs.
synonyms: Electronic scrap with precious metals and hazardous substances
original_description: Electrical and electronic waste and scrap, of a kind used principally for the recovery of precious metal, containing primary cells, primary batteries, electric accumulators, mercury-switches, glass from cathode-ray tubes or other activated glass, or electrical or electronic components containing cadmium, mercury, lead or polychlorinated biphenyls "PCBs"

description: This covers electrical and electronic waste and scrap primarily intended for recovering precious metals, but it excludes waste containing primary cells, batteries, mercury-switches, certain types of glass, or electrical/electronic components with cadmium, mercury, lead, or PCBs.
synonyms: Electronic scrap with precious metals (no hazardous substances)
original_description: Electrical and electronic waste and scrap, of a kind used principally for the recovery of precious metal (excl. containing primary cells, primary batteries, electric accumulators, mercury-switches, glass from cathode-ray tubes or other activated glass, or electrical or electronic components containing cadmium, mercury, lead or polychlorinated biphenyls "PCBs")

description: This covers waste and scrap from electrical and electronic assemblies and printed circuit boards (PCBs) that contain primary cells, batteries, mercury-switches, certain types of glass, or electrical/electronic components with cadmium, mercury, lead, or PCBs. This category is not for precious metal recovery.
original_description: Waste and scrap of electrical and electronic assemblies and printed circuit boards, containing primary cells, primary batteries, electric accumulators, mercury-switches, glass from cathode-ray tubes or other activated glass, or electrical or electronic components containing cadmium, mercury, lead or polychlorinated biphenyls "PCBs" (excl. for the recovery of precious metal)

description: This covers waste and scrap from electrical and electronic assemblies and printed circuit boards (PCBs), excluding those for precious metal recovery, and those containing primary cells, batteries, mercury-switches, certain types of glass, or electrical/electronic components with cadmium, mercury, lead, or PCBs.
original_description: Waste and scrap of electrical and electronic assemblies and printed circuit boards (excl. for the recovery of precious metal, or containing primary cells, primary batteries, electric accumulators, mercury-switches, glass from cathode-ray tubes or other activated glass, or electrical or electronic components containing cadmium, mercury, lead or polychlorinated biphenyls "PCBs")

description: This covers electrical and electronic waste and scrap that contains primary cells, batteries, mercury-switches, certain types of glass, or electrical/electronic components with cadmium, mercury, lead, or PCBs, but is not primarily for precious metal recovery, and is not electrical/electronic assemblies or printed circuit boards.
synonyms: Miscellaneous electronic waste with hazardous substances
original_description: Electrical and electronic waste and scrap, containing primary cells, primary batteries or electric accumulators but not predominantly, or containing mercury-switches, glass from cathode-ray tubes or other activated glass, or electrical or electronic components containing cadmium, mercury, lead or polychlorinated biphenyls "PCBs" (excl. for the recovery of precious metal, and electrical and electronic assemblies and printed circuit boards)

description: This covers electrical and electronic waste and scrap, excluding those for precious metal recovery, electrical/electronic assemblies and printed circuit boards, and those containing primary cells, batteries, mercury-switches, certain types of glass, or electrical/electronic components with cadmium, mercury, lead, or PCBs.
synonyms: Miscellaneous electronic waste without hazardous substances
original_description: Electrical and electronic waste and scrap (excl. for the recovery of precious metal, electrical and electronic assemblies and printed circuit boards, and containing primary cells, primary batteries, electric accumulators, mercury-switches, glass from cathode-ray tubes or other activated glass, or electrical or electronic components containing cadmium, mercury, lead or polychlorinated biphenyls "PCBs")

description: These are railway locomotives that draw their power from an external source of electricity, such as overhead lines or a third rail.
original_description: Rail locomotives powered from an external source of electricity

description: These are railway locomotives that are powered by onboard electric batteries or accumulators.
original_description: Rail locomotives powered by electric accumulators

description: These are locomotives that use a diesel engine to power an electrical generator, which in turn supplies electricity to traction motors that drive the wheels.
original_description: Diesel-electric locomotives

description: This category includes all other types of rail locomotives, excluding those powered by external electricity, electric accumulators, or diesel-electric systems.
original_description: Rail locomotives (excl. those powered from an external source of electricity or by accumulators and diesel-electric locomotives)

description: These are self-propelled railway or tramway vehicles (coaches, vans, trucks) that get their power from an external electricity source, but they are not maintenance or service vehicles.
original_description: Self-propelled railway or tramway coaches, vans and trucks, powered from an external source of electricity (excl. those of heading 8604)

description: This covers self-propelled railway or tramway vehicles (coaches, vans, trucks) that are not powered by an external electricity source and are not maintenance or service vehicles.
original_description: Self-propelled railway or tramway coaches, vans and trucks (excl. those powered from an external source of electricity and those of heading 8604)

description: These are specialized vehicles used for maintaining or servicing railway or tramway tracks and infrastructure. They can be self-propelled or not, and include items like workshops on wheels, cranes, ballast tampers, and track inspection vehicles.
original_description: Railway or tramway maintenance or service vehicles, whether or not self-propelled, e.g., workshops, cranes, ballast tampers, trackliners, testing coaches and track inspection vehicles

original_description: Railway or tramway passenger coaches, luggage vans, post office coaches and other special purpose railway or tramway coaches (excl. self-propelled railway or tramway coaches, vans and trucks, railway or tramway maintenance or service vehicles and goods vans and wagons)

description: These are railway or tramway wagons designed to unload their contents automatically, excluding tank wagons and insulated or refrigerated wagons.

original_description: Railway or tramway goods vans and wagons, covered and closed, specially designed for the transport of highly radioactive materials [Euratom] (excl. tank wagons and the like and insulated, refrigerated or self-discharging goods vans and wagons)

description: These are covered and closed railway or tramway wagons for transporting goods, excluding those for highly radioactive materials, tank wagons, and self-discharging wagons.
original_description: Railway or tramway goods vans and wagons, covered and closed (excl. those specially designed for the transport of highly radioactive materials, tank wagons and the like and self-discharging goods vans and wagons)

original_description: Instruments and appliances used in oceanography (excl. compasses, rangefinders, theodolites, tachymeters "tacheometers", levels and photogrammetrical surveying instruments and appliances)

description: Parts and accessories for various surveying, mapping, and scientific instruments, including those for geodesy, topography, photogrammetry, hydrography, oceanography, hydrology, meteorology, geophysics, and rangefinders.
original_description: Parts and accessories for instruments and appliances used in geodesy, topography, photogrammetrical surveying, hydrography, oceanography, hydrology, meteorology or geophysics, and for rangefinders, n.e.s.

description: Components and additional items for highly sensitive weighing balances (50 mg or better), not elsewhere specified.

description: Various instruments and appliances used in dental sciences, not specifically covered by other categories.

description: Various other instruments and appliances used in medical, surgical, or veterinary sciences, not elsewhere specified.
